tasks.report: Successfully ran bun link. Verified symlink created in ~/.bun/bin/work pointing to dist/bin/work.js in global node_modules.

tasks.name: Verify work --help works from any directory after global install
tasks.report: Verified work --help and work --version work correctly from multiple directories (/Users/beto/agenv, /tmp, ~). Global installation is functioning properly.

tasks.report: Tested core commands (status, list, tree, read, create --help) with compiled code - all working correctly. Verified TypeScript types are properly exported in dist/src/index.d.ts and dist/src/lib/types.d.ts.
